about_the_game:
Original: 上海アリス幻樂団 - ZUN
Tribute: "少女終末旅行"
This is a Touhou Project secondary fan game, the setting differs from the original
Welcome to add our game to your wishlist! QQ exchange group: 106115456
(I'm using Google Translate and some expressions may be incorrect)
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Game Background

"Renko, look! It's a city" "I can't see the end at a glance... Where is this place, it's a city, but it feels very desolate..."
"Hey, Renko, do you think this could be the original Gensokyo?"

Renko and Merry of the Secret Sealing Club
Were invited to the "Outer Gensokyo" for a short trip
Outer Gensokyo (New Gensokyo) is a new Gensokyo independent of the original Gensokyo (Old Gensokyo)
But the original Gensokyo was destroyed for some reason
By chance, Renko and Merry boarded the train to the original Gensokyo

They didn't know that what awaited them was a huge tomb of the steel forest
And a sudden train accident trapped the two in Gensokyo
In order to find her missing friend Merry, Renko began a new journey in the icy Gensokyo
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Gameplay

Gensokyo is no longer a paradise, struggle to survive in this cruel world

The biting cold will kill you, if you don't have energy, you will fall in the snow

Scavenge for supplies, light a campfire, cook food


Danger not only comes from the cold weather, you will encounter strange and terrifying enemies
Hungry wolves, terrifying killing machines...

Why has it become like this? Why do these machines attack humans?
Find guns, protect yourself!

Craft items, modify guns to better deal with various situations

Hunt, find more food and supplies

Complete difficult tasks, face powerful enemies, fight alongside teammates

Find lost friends, meet other survivors, strive to survive

"Merry, I will definitely find you..."

"No matter how far, no matter how dangerous, I will definitely..."

Uncover the truth behind the world's destruction, find hope for the survival of the end of the world


----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A few words from the developer

Hello everyone! This is Crow Crow Island! We are the production team of this game! Our team currently only has two crows (people)
We are ⑨冻夜雀舌 and 阿鸦 (me), I am responsible for the main content of this game (program, art ,music), 雀舌 helps me with music and art
The game trial and distribution are free, only the game's original soundtrack (Game original Soundtrack) is an optional dlc charge
The game pays tribute to tkmiz sensei's "少女終末旅行", and has received tkmiz sensei's approval~
I have added many related elements, I hope friends who like Touhou and 少女終末旅行 like my game
We are looking for a translation team, need Japanese and English direction translation,
Because the game itself is free, so I'm sorry I can't provide funds for friends who help translate;
But I will still send a small gift as a thank you, so friends who are interested are welcome to contact me~

movies.name: 秘封最后旅 ~ Edge of Realm Demo PV

name: 秘封最后旅 ~ Edge of Realm

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows® 8.1/10/11 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: A Touhou fan game and a 2D pixel shooting survival game, telling the story of Renko looking for her friend Merry in the destroyed Gensokyo, finding the truth about the destruction of Gensokyo and saving the world.
